@Test public void testReducingBall(){
  List<Vector3D> list=Arrays.asList(new Vector3D(-7.140397329568118,-16.571661242582177,11.714458961735405),new Vector3D(-7.137986707455888,-16.570767323375720,11.708602108715928),new Vector3D(-7.139185068549035,-16.570891204702250,11.715554057357394),new Vector3D(-7.142682716997507,-16.571609818234290,11.710787934580328),new Vector3D(-7.139018392423351,-16.574405614157020,11.710518716711425),new Vector3D(-7.140870659936730,-16.567993074240455,11.710914678204503),new Vector3D(-7.136350173659562,-16.570498228820930,11.713965225900928),new Vector3D(-7.141675762759172,-16.572852471407028,11.714033471449508),new Vector3D(-7.140453077221105,-16.570212820780647,11.708624578004980),new Vector3D(-7.140322188726825,-16.574152894557717,11.710305611121410),new Vector3D(-7.141116131477088,-16.574061164624560,11.712938509321699));
  WelzlEncloser<Euclidean3D,Vector3D> encloser=new WelzlEncloser<Euclidean3D,Vector3D>(1.0e-10,new SphereGenerator());
  EnclosingBall<Euclidean3D,Vector3D> ball=encloser.enclose(list);
  Assert.assertTrue(ball.getRadius() > 0);
}
